archimate:Assessment.name: Technical vulnerability Management not workign in Norway deliveries. There are too many technical vulnerabilities
archimate:Assessment.documentation:
Technical vulnerability management is not working. There are around 1000 technical assets in Norway delivery enviornment which doesn't have proper ownerships. Within these assets, there are over 2000 findings with a CVSS rating for more than 4.0.
One of the key PCI-DSS requirements is to establish a process to identify security vulnerabilities and apply all applicable security patches.
